extendedInfo.description: Experience World War II's most epic and legendary air battles in Asia and Pacific theaters on your Android mobile phone.From the attack on Pearl Harbor, and all the way to the bombing of Tokyo, take command of 12 famous Pacific fighters and bombers in a challenging 3D game.

reviews.title: Good but...
reviews.comment: For the price it is its not entirely worth it because you should be allowed to pick different teams and follow different story lines for different teams... Plus controlls should be more smooth and flight should be more smooth, free and more avalible to move about and not stiff :/
reviews.author: Calum Mc neill

reviews.title: Awesome Game
reviews.comment: Great job i love this game, controls are smooth, graphics are excellent. The only thing missing is multiplayer option
reviews.author: Flako Ramirez

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: Fun game but need to update more.
reviews.author: David Beatty

reviews.title: Needs more
reviews.comment: AA guns didnt shoot anywhere near that fast and i get shot up by ghost enemy B4 i get within one mile of real enemy
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Lg esteem
reviews.comment: Love the game. Could use a survival mode of all maps also should make it harder for enemy to hit you. Uts really easy to die even when barrel rolling.
reviews.author: Angel daniel

reviews.title: Needs recalibrate
reviews.comment: Fun if you are in the right position. But if you want to play lying down you are SOL
reviews.author: Thomas Steele

reviews.title: Cool Game But...
reviews.comment: Needs more missions and a fix to make getting automatically shot at the begginning of each engagement more realistic, like only when you really have a bogey on your tail. I dont like getting shot up by ghost enemy before youve even reached the enemy.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best game
reviews.comment: Update with more missions please.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Epic!
reviews.comment: This is the best game i have ever played! To make it better you should add a multiplayer option.
reviews.author: Ian Mcdonald

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Love it just like my game blazing angels
reviews.author: Luca Gonzalez

reviews.title: Its cool
reviews.comment: Nothing too fancy but fun none the less.
reviews.author: J.L. Cervantes

reviews.title: Winds of Steel
reviews.comment: This is probably my favorite game for android. Runs great on my Galaxy S II.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool app
reviews.comment: It would be great if with all system updates if the app didn\'t crash!
reviews.author: Michael Tillman

reviews.title: HTC Desire C
reviews.comment: Great game and for once your not flying an American plane which is different I like!!!
reviews.author: Zechariah Lee

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: Fun
reviews.author: Fred Lamont

reviews.title: Omg
reviews.comment: Please refund!!!!
reviews.author: Alex Alx

reviews.title: Think of the possibilities
reviews.comment: This game would be a better hit if there was multiplayer. One where you would have to bomb eachothers bases over wifi. 4v4
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: More Content Please!
reviews.comment: I love this game guys... However more content is required. More LEVELS & more AIRCRAFT... Yes please! P-38 Lightning, Hellcat, Spitfire, Hurricane... Just to name a few. How about an Aircraft Carrier based level... Wow! So you boys better get cracking, lots to do now! We the fans expect good thing very soon... An update... !!YES PLEASE!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Need update
reviews.comment: Need more updates. More levels required. A paid game cannot have just so few levels. Where are the developers?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good game.....
reviews.comment: Worked perfectly before update, force closes sometimes but when u play it its a good game
reviews.author: A Google User
